name: Don't Let Him In (itch)
description:
Twitter - Youtube

Thank you for your ongoing support, Itch.io users! Get ready for a heart-pounding horror experience best played at night.

In this psychological horror game you'll join three friends who are excited to see their favorite band, only to encounter a hitchhiker on a desolate highway. As the miles pass by, the hitchhiker's unsettling presence becomes sinister, and their true identity is shrouded in darkness. Will you be able to make it to the end of the road and survive?

Immerse yourself in an engaging story with gripping cutscenes, with a choice of four different vintage retro styles that add to the game's unique atmosphere.

The soundtrack compliments and that heightens the suspense during the unsettling gameplay sections, this game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat. So turn off the lights, put on your headphones, and prepare for a truly memorable horror adventure.

Playtime: Approx. 1hour to 90 mins. Perfect Bedtime Horror Length.

Currently WINDOWS ONLY 

(Xbox Gamepad Supported)

Developer Note

Hey there! It's jonniemadeit, and I wanted to give you all a quick update on my latest project. This is actually my first paid project, and I've put a ton of love and care into it to make it the best it can be. As a solo developer, I'm aware that there may be some bugs and upcoming updates needed after this first release but I've included saved checkpoints to hopefully mitigate most issues. I just want to ask for your understanding and support as I continue to work on this project. Thanks so much for your support, and I hope you all enjoy using it as much as I enjoyed making it!
